column1: #text=My family and I began by going through the gruesome experience of the airport .
#text=2 hours later we were finally on the plane and ready to take off .
#text=We put on our seat belts and got mentally prepared for the flight ahead .
#text=Fortunately we were going to Disney World and were all ecstatic for the experience that was to come .
#text=The problem is that my brother has a major fear of heights and airplanes , and I had to sit by him .
#text=I told him not to watch the movies about airplanes crashing , but he never listens and frightens himself more with each scene .
#text=The pilot and flight attendants do a great job at catering to everyone 's needs .
#text=The pilot keeps the plane steady with very little turbulence making a easy and safe ride for all .
#text=We arrive at our destination and after a bumpy landing we have arrived in Florida and are ready to go to Disney World !
